title: Muthoot Finance Ltd down for fifth straight session - Business Standard
content: Muthoot Finance Ltd down for fifth straight session  Business Standard
description: Muthoot Finance Ltd is quoting at Rs 1177, down 2.05% on the day as on 13:19 IST on the NSE. The stock tumbled 1.75% in last one year as compared to a 9.98% rally in NIFTY and a 1.69% spurt in the Nifty Financial Services index.
